body.description: EleCare Jr is a hypoallergenic, nutritionally complete amino acid-based nutrition powder for children who cannot tolerate intact or hydrolyzed protein. With 100% free amino acids as the protein source, EleCare Jr supports growth and development. EleCare Jr helps improve symptoms of food allergies and various gastrointestinal (GI) conditions. Does not contain milk protein, soy protein, fructose, galactose, lactose, or gluten.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Well-tolerated, Amino Acid–based Nutrition Powder EleCare Jr is clinically shown to help improve symptoms of food allergies and other GI conditions. It’s a hypoallergenic nutrition powder that is clinically shown to be well tolerated by children who cannot tolerate intact or hydrolyzed protein. Clear Evidence for Growth Specially formulated nutrition to support your child’s growth and development. EleCare Jr is clinically shown to support growth when used as a primary source of nutrition. Navigating Reimbursement Get information on insurance and reimbursement assistance through the Pathway Plus website. How it works: Step 1. Call with insurance and prescriber information; Step 2. Pathway Plus helps determine coverage options; Step 3. Product can be delivered right to your door. Mixing Instructions To make approximately 6 fl oz, pour 5 ounces of water into a clean container and add 4 unpacked level scoops (38 grams). Cap container and shake well. After feeding begins, use within 1 hour or discard. Mixing instructions vary by flavor.
EleCare Jr EleCare Ages 1 year & older 0-12 months Complete Nutrition ✓ ✓ Hypoallergenic ✓ ✓ 100% free amino acids as protein source ✓ ✓ Percent MCTs 33% 33% Flavors Unflavored, Vanilla Unflavored

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The review provided by a 2 year old was extremely positive!
reviews.reviewText: We got this for our neighbor's 2 year old. He has gastrointestinal issues as was already being fed EleCare Jr, but in the chocolate and the unflavored variety. We were all worried that he wouldn't like this vanilla flavor, but he loves it, and honestly, that's all that matters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great choice for children with sensitive digestive system
reviews.reviewText: This is a very well tolerated nutrition powder for children with sensitive digestive systems or food allergies. Unfortunately these types of nutrition powders are expensive but at least this is one of the most reasonably priced one out there. I'm glad Amazon has these because these are way more expensive at local stores. Great flavor too. Very happy that I found these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Several fake sugars
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the EleCare Jr Nutrition Powder Amino Acid-Based Nutrition Powder Vanilla. Obviously, if you are ordering something like this, you are dealing with some severe concerns with foods where you need a certain diet. My son needed this type as a baby as everything else made him sick. I actually ordered it to supplement for an animal with a severe protein issue including hydrolyzed. It didn't work out, but it was a long shot. I personally have some major issues with food allergies and sensitivities, so I knew when I ordered it. If it didn't work for the animal since we're in the trial and error stage I would just be supplementing my diet. It's actually quite tasty but incredibly sugary. There are two fake sugars in here, and that is something I am not a fan of, especially if this is for babies or toddlers. I'm actually surprised they are in baby foods, but it looks like it's a regular practice. For those that can't nurse, that can be a problem. I couldn't produce enough and had to supplement with my son, but he reacted to everything. Now, I haven't looked at ratios in a long time, and this was incredibly confusing about how much you're supposed to give. It actually completely stressed me out as It's not clear at all. And when I finally did figure it out after over 10 minutes of reading, this does not last a long time because you need so many scoops. But if your child is thriving and this is just a little bit of a supplement, it can last you a little bit longer, especially because it's so sweet. For me, I will just use a scoop. I react to most vitamins and minerals, so I need to only take small amounts anyway. Anyway, as a parent to a very sick baby I'm sure I would get over the fake sugar thing because when things are that serious you just want your baby to thrive and you just give them anything that will not make them sick. I understand this is the junior version for older ones. Insurance didn't cover our speciality formula in the state I live in, but looks like many do with things like this so make sure you look into it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bit to sweet.
reviews.reviewText: The EleCare Jr Nutrition Powder Amino Acid-Based Nutrition Powder Vanilla taste great according to our little one, but voto sweet. So, we’d followed the directions on the can for the amount of fluid ounces and powder scoops. It was extremely sweet. So we decided to try much lesser scoops of powder and let him taste it first, then we adjusted accordingly to his taste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality nutrition powder
reviews.reviewText: This amino acid based nutrition powder in vanilla is pretty tasty but I didn't realize it's sweetened with sucralose which I try to avoid. It's really easy on the stomach and didn't cause any digestive problems. It mixes very well and the powder must be used within 1 month after opening. You can make some ahead of time and store it in the refrigerator for up to 24 hours. Great nutrition powder for sensitive stomachs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EleCare Jr Nutrition Powder
reviews.reviewText: I have a child with a rare genetic condition and he has not yet mastered the art of eating solid foods. I'm supplementing his diet with powdered toddler formulas and oatmeal in order to maintain his calorie intake. But for quite some time now I've had a difficult time finding the powdered formula we're used to using. I came across this alternative and was able to see pretty quickly that it was a comparable item, probably even better than what I'd been using actually. The cost is not small, but for as much as you get it's worth the price and actually pretty reasonably priced. I can't speak to the flavor myself but my son sure seems to enjoy it! Would recommend to others and buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Tasty but it's approximately 10 servings per can
reviews.reviewText: So it's very tasty. Quite like any vanilla meal replacement shake. I got these for my toddler who is entering his picky stage and wanted to be sure he is getting as much nutrition as possible.With that said I have a few complaints about this product.I do find it frustrating when a product does not outright tell you how many scoops or prepared fl oz their product should yield. I handed it to my husband to ask if he could find the information that perhaps I was overlooking it for the 3 minutes I spent reading it over and over.He finally had an answer but it took a calculator and some powers of deduction to figure how many scoops one should expect from a can. The way the directions are phrased isn't helpful unless you're familiar with this brand already.But upon second inspection, there is a note that shows "when mixed as directed, makes approximately 62fl oz."I mixed as directed for the 5 fl oz water and 4 scoops. Waaay too sweet. I wound up adding more water and it produced 9oz instead of the projected 6oz. But that means there's approximately 10 - 6oz (prepared) servings if following directions.So idk... still not pleased with how this method of information about product yield is given. So 4 stars because of that.If you have the time to figure it all out, that's great. But parenting is harder some days and I would personally appreciate knowing this information in a straightforward manner. Because at the cost per can and only getting approximately 10 servings....isn't a value to me.Is it tasty? Yes, it is.Do I feel good about the ingredients? Some.Was it packaged well? Yes, it was.Would I buy this again? No. To be honest, this is too expensive for my budget considering how often I would need to buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for allergies
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my nephew who has a lot of allergies and digestive issues. He was able to tolerate it well without having an allergic reaction or issues with digestion. He seemed to like the taste, so that's a win for me!
